altername_name: Stray Sheep: The Adventure of Poe & Merry
name: Stray Sheep: Poe to Merry no Daibouken
overview: Poe is a very kind and caring sheep. In his zeal to help anyone in need, he sometimes makes mistakes. He likes to sleep and he likes to dream - he also likes flowers and is afraid of wolves. Merry is a calm and unassuming sheep, but she is also very strong-willed. She sometimes makes big mistakes, but she doesn't get too hung up about that. Merry loves Poe. STORY: The game begins when the evil Volcan Wolf got an strange ill and one of his mens tell him that he needs a sheep for the cure, so he send two of his wolfs to kidnapp a sheep for him. Poe and Merry are resting quietly in a forest when the flying ship arrives and kidnapped Merry, so Poe decide to have courage and rescue her. He starts his journey meeting Pikichi, a little bird that will help him if he find him some food, so Poe has to find first a fruit and after that a worm, to have his help. The gameplay is about moving Poe and using items that the player will find during the adventure or playing mini games to advance through the game, and finally rescue Merry. To pass the first stage the player will have to give Pikichi a fresh banana and after that a yellow worm (to do that the player will have to use a flower from the first field to convert the worm to that colour before catch it). The game features unlockables jukebox, characters, artwork & movies.
